properties.Descriptio:
Drilling of tube well (5m deep) with supplying and fixing of 0.5 HP x 4" Dia tube well pump including all necessary connections and constructing a protective cell for the pump and mounting the same to good working order

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%

properties.Observatio: Water spring is located in privet land. This is a well-developed and well-functioning water scheme.
